column1: Uchi////The food was absolutely stellar! I could not believe how good the tuna chips
column3: and other dishes were. What really made my night memorable was the "fried milk" dessert. It is meant to taste like a chocolate chip cookie dipped in milk when you bite it. In reality it is milk sorbet
column4: fried milk custard in corn flakes
column5: and chocolate souffle and a chocolate sheet. You put all of it into your spoon in tiny bites
